content.raw:
same happened to me. 

Seems like `USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB` was not set. 

I did a hack to verify this, by adding `set(USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB True)` in `drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins` `CMakeLists.txt` and applying pull request #420, then the robot stands.

@\_jrivero\_ do you remember how you enabled `USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB` for a 64 bit machine?
content.html:
same happened to me.

Seems like USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB was not set.

I did a hack to verify this, by adding set(USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB True) in drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins CMakeLists.txt and applying pull request #420, then the robot stands.

@_jrivero_ do you remember how you enabled USE_ATLASSIMINTERFACE_BLOB for a 64 bit machine?
